According to NHS England figures out today, a child who tested positive for Covid-19 has died at Sheffield Childrens Hospital.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Big drop in cancer referrals in Wales - BBC News
articles.description: The pandemic has affected the number of people referred for cancer treatment, figures suggest.
articles.content:
